phrases: Looks like we ran into more trouble than expected.
You only had wimpy-looking ones to deal with.
But I am amazed you actually managed to hurt Koyama.
Another guy got in my way, and he was really strong.
He was insanely strong for a kid.
I could not match him in power, so I used your spray on him.
I already had too much on my plate, so I left him.
This is exactly why I did not want to pair up with you.
We had orders to make abducting kids
with the strongest psychic powers our top priority!
If the division leader found out that you messed up like this...
I will make sure the division leader does not find out.
And the worst possible person just overheard us.
Terada-san, would not it be better to bring the other Scars here?
No, I am all that is needed from the upper echelon.
Koyama's an idiot, but his abilities are the real deal.
If that kid is an enemy, he will be a real handful,
and if he joins us, he will probably surpass me, which also is not good.
So this is not a mission.
We are just going to nip some trouble in the bud.
Oh, by the way, this is a secret.
Let us just say we are going to capture him, kthx.
What do you want to do, Kageyama-kun?
We are dealing with a huge organization with a lot of members.
I think you are going to need someone on your side.
Someone who is strong and extremely smart.
You know, like someone right under your nose...
You do not need to play the fool here.
I am going to end up clashing with Claw again someday.
So I thought I might as well do it now while I still have a fighting chance.
And by fighting chance, I mean you.
If you actually get serious about this, there is no way we would lose.
And yet we have absolutely no clues.
If there is anything you need, let me know!
No, that will not be necessary.
should be showing up any second now.
Well, that was quicker than I thought.
Which one of you is the naughty little boy?
Why do not we ask him a few questions?
Do you think Terada can win against that kid?
I do not care about that.
I am asking you if he can win.
He is a really cautious guy.
As strong as that kid was, he was still only a kid.
If I had not let my guard down, I could have easily squashed him right at the get-go.
Terada will probably be fully prepared.
So that kid's probably going to go through some harsh torture.
Hurry up and spit it out.
Why do not you take a break and let him have a sip of water?
You do not realize how cruel that suggestion is, do you?
You do not have to be nice to scum like these.
Still, he really will not talk...
I guess the Scars, Claw's upper echelon, live up to their name.
Despite going up against the boss and ending up with a scar,
their abilities were acknowledged, and they became part of the upper echelon.
And then you, Terada, heard about the kid who gave Koyama,
another Scar, some trouble and showed up.
Yet you yourself ended up being captured and tortured.
If you feel you are in trouble, you should tell us everything you know, quickly.
Everything you just said is information that I gave you!
We found out where their hideout is,
the names and abilities of the members,
I cannot believe he would tell us everything so easily.
What am I supposed to do?
It is past the time for our regular upper echelon meeting,
and yet only seven out of the eleven are even here.
I have got to wonder about Claw's management system.
Terada went off somewhere, so he should be fired.
You two also just showed up.
Yeah, and you were thirty minutes late.
We are a gathering of people who never worked well with others.
As long as we do what we need to do when we need to do it, it is fine.
Then I guess you are out, Koyama.
I heard you lost to a middle schooler.
I did not lose, and I did my job.
You really need to stop playing around
I will kill you, you pierced chicken.
I just got a message from the boss.
Said he is coming back to Japan next month.
Seems he is going to pick a couple of you to be the upper echelon back at HQ.
Yes, but it looks rather doubtful that he would pick you,
considering how badly you messed up today.
Basically, our goal is world domination.
They say a skilled hawk hides its claws, but we are not like that.
We will be hawks who do not hide our claws.
We will steal everything we can,
stand at the top of the world,
and lead humanity into its rightful future!
Are any of you going to join us?
You noobs have not even been acknowledged as members yet.
We do not have psychic powers.
This is some kind of misunderstanding, so please let us go home.
Did you all secretly agree to act like you do not have psychic powers
I will show you just what you get if you look down on me.
They are going to try to brainwash us one by one.
This is going to happen to you, too.
Take the night to reconsider your attitudes...
If you do not want to die, that is.
These powers cannot be coming from a child...
Considering how badly we beat him, I am sure he will not try to defy us again.
It would just be a waste of time, so let us just save your little brother.
You will pay with your lives for trampling all over my pride!
With a maximum range of sixty meters,
my powers will display their true potential in this environment!
Why did trees fall from the sky?
He said he used telekinetic powers in the shape of whips.
If I let you infiltrate the facility like this,
Well, I guess you are not so lame after
while I am concentrating on the whip, do something!
I guess there are a lot of ways to use powers.
Apparently technique means nothing before absolute power.
You were finished as soon as Kageyama-kun considered you an enemy.
This battle will only last a night.
If we defy them, we die!
If I am going to be shackled by fear and brainwashed,
I would rather try to escape, even if it means I could die.
It will take him a while to get over this.
Yeah, I want to escape, too.
Apparently, my younger brother is fine.
We can communicate even if the other is far away.
I was just talking to him now.
Apparently he was shown our corpses.
but I think that guy has hypnotic powers that show us illusions.
He is probably the key to this organization's ability to brainwash people through fear.
It is a good thing he took my brother, who I can talk to telepathically.
But that does not change the fact that this is a dangerous organization.
And that is exactly why we cannot stay here long.
while the trainers are still underestimating us.
H-Hey, those guys are discussing something.
I know it is a terrible time to bring this up...
Before I tell you all my plan, what were your,
You did not even remember our names?!
You always were hard to read
with that gloomy face of yours...
I guess we will just have to introduce ourselves again.
Pleasure to work with you, Kageyama-kun.
I have super strong telekinetic powers.
I am called the godsend who can burn everything in his path.
Pleasure to work with you both.
The guy who got taken away is my little brother Kaito.
Let us hurry up and rescue Kaito-kun and get the heck out of here.
But do you have a plan?
Also, the trainers are right there.
I think they already know that we are trying to escape.
I am sure there were other kids who tried to do the same thing.
That would mean they are used to dealing with escape attempts.
There goes any chance we had.
If they are underestimating our powers, we will be able to escape.
They probably let their guard down because we are kids.
They did not check our belongings.
Do you really carry that around everywhere?
I guess everything's worth a shot.
Wh-What is our next move, Kageyama?
Let me just warn you that it is safer in that cell.
If you step even one foot out of there, we are going to have to discipline you.
Are you telling me you did not plan this far ahead?
Let us use Hoshino-kun's super strong telekinesis
and Asahi-kun's fire to get out of here.
you cannot move something as heavy as a person with telekinesis.
Even though I am a pyrokinetic genius,
I do not think I can set fire to something that is moving.
I will take care of it, then.
Though I am nowhere near as good as you guys.
You will all be held responsible either way.
Do you think we would hold back on you because you are kids?
Why would I ever expect incompetent, disposable lackeys like you
to have that kind of common sense?
Y-You are going to be killed, Kageyama.
Well, try protecting yourself with the spoon-bending that you are so good at,
You probably did not need us to open the lock...
No, we needed to show them that we were powerless.
This is a blind spot for that security camera.
Let us have them think we are being disciplined for a while
But I do not know where Kaito is.
Kurosaki-san, now we are going to have to rely on your clairvoyance.
There are some tough-looking guys standing by the entrance.
What do you want to do?
Shigeo, you need to think, too.
L-Let us concentrate on rescuing Ritsu.
It is the Air Whips I just learned earlier.
It is easier to possess someone when they are in shock.
You seem used to this, Dimple-kun.
Are you a pretty dangerous evil spirit?
We might have been better off if you would possessed Terada.
Espers all have mental protection on them,
so they are hard for evil spirits to possess.
That goes for you guys, too.
Not to mention, I am a lot weaker right now.
Usually, I would be able to destroy people's minds.
You were not a big deal before, either.
We are counting on you, Kurosaki-san.
All right, let us keep going.
Hey, are you trying to kill him?
It is because we both hit him at once.
Leave all the grunts to me.
First, we have to find out where they are holding your brother first.
His casual attitude is throwing me off.
This is supposed to be a tense situation.
You abducted some kids, did not you?
The children are in the basement...
We can hear you over the radio.
It is got to be him.
That means Terada got his ass kicked.
I will take care of him.
I am delighted beyond words that I get to see him again so soon.
Are you saying we should leave him to just you?
Stay outta my way, you bastards!
There is more than one intruder.
You are going to lose again.
But you will not get away with losing to the same person twice.
Now we are up against the clock.
Let us split up and find your brother.
Crap, the mini boss just appeared.
I beat the crap outta you, and you can already move?
Well, I am glad you are doing well.
I will kill you this time...
Let us both hit him with our full powers at the same time.
We do not have time right now.
You are trying to reserve your stamina?
You meant that you did not have time to try to hold back on him...
Did not expect that from Kageyama-kun.
We are definitely dealing with someone powerful.
Show the intruders the true terror of Claw.
Mob infiltrates Claw's hideout along with Teru,
who has 150 on top of his head, and the creepy-looking balloon, Dimple.
They end up facing the Scars, who childishly refuse to hold back.
Are you going to be able to win this, Mob?!
The serious option C involves Blu-rays, manga volumes, and events!
